name: FNF VS Anniversary MOD (sundayy_xd)
description:
New MOD for Friday Night Funkin' that includes loads of content to celebrate the anniversary of FNF, from new skins for BoyFriend and GirlFriend to amazing stage and character designs. It is a really well-crafted MOD and we could say that it is one of the best releases of this week, and possibly this month. What are you waiting to try it?

FNF VS Anniversary weeks contain 7 new songs, plus 2 bonus songs and a tutorial week. These are quite varied songs, most of which offer a high level of difficulty. In addition, throughout the songs we will face different famous MODS characters from the FNF such as Sarvente, Gracelo, and Spooky. We will also find an incredible version of Daddy Dearest, who we will see transformed into the character from the anime Berseker, this being one of the most remarkable weeks together with the week against Sarvente, in which we will find a musical challenge in which the arrows they move at full speed and a musical base that sounds really good.

FNF VS Anniversary offers us different backgrounds for each week, with varied designs. In the first week we will find a black and white background, in which the colored arrows and an incredible version of Daddy Dearest stand out. In the second week we will find a background that evokes MOD VS Garcelo, in the third week a dark Background in the style of the antagonists.

Throughout each week we will have different versions of BF and GF, each one even more elaborated than the previous one. These are designs with very different styles that look really good, being one of the best BF and GF vs Sarvente. Finally, we will find two bonus songs in which there is no antagonist and we will have a musical duet with BF and GF (also with a new design). This is a MOD that offers great quality in its music, but it stands out especially for its graphic section, both for the variety of stages and for the different design styles of the characters it offers. Also, it should be noted that future updates with even more content are scheduled, such as characters from Jojo's Bizarre Adventures WOW!

New Features of VS Anniversary FNF MOD
  • 3 new weeks.
  • Tutorial.
  • 7 New Songs (Remixes).
  • 2 Bonus song.
  • New characters.
  • BF and GF skins.
  • Custom backgrounds.
  • Custom menu.
